page.title: 09Employment
page.content:
Three large factories on the outskirts of the village provide employment for a good number of men and women. The Milk Marketing Board has a wide variety of jobs; Wincanton Engineering manufactures wooden pallettes and fibre-glass mouldings; Small and Tidmas lace factory produces material which is sent all over the world (it supplied the lace for HRH the Princess Anne's wedding dress).
There are, too, at least six small building firms and a wide range of 'cottage' industries within the area.
Many people work farther afield, a lot of them in and around Chard.
